title: Go-to Dahl
process: Peel and finely chop the garlic and ginger. Finely chop the scallions. Drain the chickpeas and lentils and rinse thoroughly. Chop the cherry tomatoes in half

Heat the oil for 1 minute in a large saucepan over a high heat. Add the garlic, ginger and scallions and cook for 1 minute. Add the cherry tomatoes and cook for a further 2 minutes. Add the remaining ingredients to the pan and bring to the boil, stirring occasionally to make sure it doesnâ€™t stick to the bottom. Leave to simmer for a further 2 minutes, then take off the heat.
While the dahl is simmering, toast your pitta breads.
Garnish with some chilli flakes and fresh coriander (or other fresh herb of your choice), and serve with your hot pittas, chopped into soldiers, and some rice or couscous.
